p.rus: Bootstrap следует общим веб-стандартам, и—при минимальных дополнительных усилиях—может быть использован для создания сайтов, доступных через <abbr title="Assistive Technology (Вспомогательные Технологии)" class="initialism">AT</abbr>.
p.eng: Bootstrap follows common web standards and—with minimal extra effort—can be used to create sites that are accessible to those using <abbr title="Assistive Technology" class="initialism">AT</abbr>.

p.rus: Если ваше навигационное меню имеет много линков и находится перед главным содержанием в DOM, добавьте линк Перейти к главному содержимому непосредственно после тега <body>. (прочитайте почему)
p.eng: If your navigation contains many links and comes before the main content in the DOM, add a Skip to main content link immediately after your opening <body> tag. (read why)

p.rus: При вложении заголовков (<h1> - <h6>), ваш основное заглавие документа должен быть <h1>. Следующие заголовки должны логически вибудовуватись используя <h2> - <h6>, чтобы программа, которая считывает заголовки, могла сконструировать содержание страницы.
p.eng: When nesting headings (<h1> - <h6>), your primary document header should be an <h1>. Subsequent headings should make logical use of <h2> - <h6> such that screen readers can construct a table of contents for your pages.

p.rus: Узнайте больше о HTML CodeSniffer и Penn state's AccessAbility.
p.eng: Learn more at HTML CodeSniffer and Penn State's AccessAbility.

p.rus: Currently, some of the default color combinations available in Bootstrap (such as the various styled button classes, some of the code highlighting colors used for basic code blocks, the .bg-primary contextual background helper class, and the default link color when used on a white background) have a low contrast ratio (below the recommended ratio of 4.5:1). This can cause problems to users with low vision or who are color blind. These default colors may need to be modified to increase their contrast and legibility.
p.eng: Currently, some of the default color combinations available in Bootstrap (such as the various styled button classes, some of the code highlighting colors used for basic code blocks, the .bg-primary contextual background helper class, and the default link color when used on a white background) have a low contrast ratio (below the recommended ratio of 4.5:1). This can cause problems to users with low vision or who are color blind. These default colors may need to be modified to increase their contrast and legibility.

li.rus: "HTML Codesniffer" bookmarklet for identifying accessibility issues
li.eng: "HTML Codesniffer" bookmarklet for identifying accessibility issues
